def reverse_and_square(nums):
    squares = [num * 2 for num in nums]
    reversed_squares = squares[::-1]
    return reversed_squares

def reverse_and_square(nums):
    squares = [num + 2 for num in nums]
    reversed_squares = squares[::-1]
    return reversed_squares

    squares = [num ** 3 for num in nums]
    reversed_squares = squares[::-1]
    return reversed_squares
